trans-unit.source: derby.system.durability

seg-source.mrk: derby.system.durability

target.mrk: derby.system.durability

trans-unit.source: derby.system.durability

seg-source.mrk: derby.system.durability

target.mrk: derby.system.durability

trans-unit.source: Function

seg-source.mrk: Function

target.mrk: Function

trans-unit.source: This property changes the default durability of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to improve performance at the expense of consistency and durability of the database. The only valid supported case insensitive value is <codeph>test</codeph>. If this property is set to any value other than <codeph>test</codeph>, this property setting is ignored. When <codeph>derby.system.durability</codeph> is set to <codeph>test</codeph>, the store system will not force I/O synchronization calls for:

seg-source.mrk: This property changes the default durability of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to improve performance at the expense of consistency and durability of the database.
The only valid supported case insensitive value is <codeph>test</codeph>.
If this property is set to any value other than <codeph>test</codeph>, this property setting is ignored.
When <codeph>derby.system.durability</codeph> is set to <codeph>test</codeph>, the store system will not force I/O synchronization calls for:

target.mrk: This property changes the default durability of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to improve performance at the expense of consistency and durability of the database.
The only valid supported case insensitive value is <codeph>test</codeph>.
If this property is set to any value other than <codeph>test</codeph>, this property setting is ignored.
When <codeph>derby.system.durability</codeph> is set to <codeph>test</codeph>, the store system will not force I/O synchronization calls for:

trans-unit.source: The log file at each commit

seg-source.mrk: The log file at each commit

target.mrk: The log file at each commit

trans-unit.source: The log file before a data page is forced to disk

target.mrk: The log file before a data page is forced to disk

target.mrk: Page allocation when a file is grown

trans-unit.source: Data writes during checkpoints

seg-source.mrk: Data writes during checkpoints

target.mrk: Data writes during checkpoints

trans-unit.source: While performance is improved, note that under these conditions, a commit no longer guarantees that the transaction's modification will survive a system crash or JVM termination, the database may not recover successfully upon restart, a near-full disk at runtime may cause unexpected errors, and the database may be in an inconsistent state.

seg-source.mrk: While performance is improved, note that under these conditions, a commit no longer guarantees that the transaction's modification will survive a system crash or JVM termination, the database may not recover successfully upon restart, a near-full disk at runtime may cause unexpected errors, and the database may be in an inconsistent state.

target.mrk: While performance is improved, note that under these conditions, a commit no longer guarantees that the transaction's modification will survive a system crash or JVM termination, the database may not recover successfully upon restart, a near-full disk at runtime may cause unexpected errors, and the database may be in an inconsistent state.

trans-unit.source: If you boot the database with this property set to <codeph>test</codeph>, the following warning message is logged in the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file:

seg-source.mrk: If you boot the database with this property set to <codeph>test</codeph>, the following warning message is logged in the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file:

target.mrk: If you boot the database with this property set to <codeph>test</codeph>, the following warning message is logged in the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file:

trans-unit.source: WARNING: The database is booted with derby.system.durability=test. In this mode, it is possible that database may not be able to recover, committed transactions may be lost, and the database may be in an inconsistent state. Please use this mode only when these consequences are acceptable.

seg-source.mrk: WARNING: The database is booted with derby.system.durability=test.
In this mode, it is possible that database may not be able to recover, committed transactions may be lost, and the database may be in an inconsistent state.
Please use this mode only when these consequences are acceptable.

target.mrk: WARNING: The database is booted with derby.system.durability=test.
In this mode, it is possible that database may not be able to recover, committed transactions may be lost, and the database may be in an inconsistent state.
Please use this mode only when these consequences are acceptable.

trans-unit.source: A similar message will appear in the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file if the database was booted with <codeph>derby.system.durability=test</codeph> at any time previously.

seg-source.mrk: A similar message will appear in the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file if the database was booted with <codeph>derby.system.durability=test</codeph> at any time previously.

target.mrk: A similar message will appear in the <codeph>derby.log</codeph> file if the database was booted with <codeph>derby.system.durability=test</codeph> at any time previously.

trans-unit.source: Once the database is booted with <codeph>derby.system.durability=test</codeph>, there are no guarantees that the database is consistent.

seg-source.mrk: Once the database is booted with <codeph>derby.system.durability=test</codeph>, there are no guarantees that the database is consistent.

target.mrk: Once the database is booted with <codeph>derby.system.durability=test</codeph>, there are no guarantees that the database is consistent.

trans-unit.source: Default

seg-source.mrk: Default

target.mrk: Default

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored by default.

seg-source.mrk: This property is ignored by default.

target.mrk: This property is ignored by default.

trans-unit.source: Supported values

seg-source.mrk: Supported values

target.mrk: Supported values

trans-unit.source: The only supported value is <codeph>test</codeph>.

seg-source.mrk: The only supported value is <codeph>test</codeph>.

target.mrk: The only supported value is <codeph>test</codeph>.

trans-unit.source: Example

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: derby.system.durability=test

seg-source.mrk: derby.system.durability=test

target.mrk: derby.system.durability=test

trans-unit.source: Since this is a system property, you can set it in the <codeph>derby.properties</codeph> file or on the command line of the JVM when starting the application.

seg-source.mrk: Since this is a system property, you can set it in the <codeph>derby.properties</codeph> file or on the command line of the JVM when starting the application.

target.mrk: Since this is a system property, you can set it in the <codeph>derby.properties</codeph> file or on the command line of the JVM when starting the application.

trans-unit.source: You might enable this property when using <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> as a test database where consistency or recoverability is not an issue.

seg-source.mrk: You might enable this property when using <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> as a test database where consistency or recoverability is not an issue.

target.mrk: You might enable this property when using <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> as a test database where consistency or recoverability is not an issue.

trans-unit.source: Dynamic or static

seg-source.mrk: Dynamic or static

target.mrk: Dynamic or static

trans-unit.source: This property is static; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change does not take effect until you reboot.

seg-source.mrk: This property is static; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change does not take effect until you reboot.

target.mrk: This property is static; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change does not take effect until you reboot.
